name: The Malstrums Mansion
description:
1989 is a cool year to release a game! On the Apple II there is a new platform game called Prince of Persia. On the Nintendo Entertainment System Megaman 2 was just released. At the arcades there is this new game called Final Fight...

At ACE Team we don't let small things like irreversible time to stop us from working on our projects, so we have taken a break from working on ZenoClash, our awesome 2009 first person melee fighting game, and we have traveled back in time to release The Malstrums Mansion, a "Shadowgate" style adventure game which was never published.

The Malstrums Mansion 1.0
ACE Team Software, 1989
